video_workbench_tagline: High-speed client-side video conversion and compression.
welcome_desc: Secure, high-speed, client-side video conversion tool.
feature_1: Latest client-side encoding using WebCodecs API.
feature_2: No uploading: Your data stays on your machine.
feature_3: Drag & drop to easily adjust resolution and quality.

meta_keywords: video converter, video compression, WebCodecs, MP4, WebM, local processing
